title: Bloomberg Markets: Kroll on Bill Miller's Bitcoin Bet
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Kroll on Bill Miller's Bitcoin Bet
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Steven Kroll\u0010Managing Director\u0010Monness Crespi Hardt & Co \u0010Discussing investment ideas from the latest "Titans Dinner", including Bill Miller of Miller Value Partners investing in bitcoin.
